titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to repeal the 12-year limitation of eligibility for the vocational rehabilitation program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education, Training and Employment.

bill.summary: 7/28/1993--Introduced. Repeals a Federal provision which generally limits a veteran's eligibility for veterans' vocational rehabilitation to 12 years after the date of discharge or release from active duty.
